article.title: Status and history for tem
article.para: No known problems at this time.

history.history-entry: Replaced U+00E5 å LATIN SMALL LETTER A WITH RING ABOVE by U+028C ʌ LATIN SMALL LETTER TURNED V (and U+00C5 Å LATIN CAPITAL LETTER A WITH RING ABOVE by U+0245 Ʌ LATIN CAPITAL LETTER TURNED V), to align with the orthography described in [Hartell].
Patrick Hall observed that most of the occurrences of ɛ, ɔ and ə are actually the uppercase forms, when they should probably be lowercase; this is now fixed.
[Eric Muller] Replaced U+002D - HYPHEN-MINUS by U+2010 ‐ HYPHEN.
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, complete XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
